mapper.select:
select * from base_good where 1=1 and delStatus='Y'
and gdName like '%${gdname}%'
and gdMemCode like '%${gdmemcode}%'
and gdSort like '%${gdsort}%'
and gdNorms like '%${gdnorms}%'
order by gdId desc
mapper.sql: gdId, gdName, gdMemCode, gdWoocu, gdSort, gdType, gdNorms, gdUnit, gdOrigin, gdMax, gdMin, gdPrePrice, gdCosPrice, gdPostFree, gdRemark, createrId, createTime, updaterId, updateTime, delStatus

update base_good
gdName = #{gdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gdMemCode = #{gdmemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gdWoocu = #{gdwoocu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gdSort = #{gdsort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
